question: Which country to host ministerial meeting of UN Security Council (UNSC) on North Korea' nuclear efforts?
explanation: Japan will host a ministerial meeting of the UN Security Council (UNSC) on December 15, which will be focused on finding peaceful ways to pressure North Korea to halt its nuclear and ballistic missile tests and de-nuclearise the Korean peninsula. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres is expected to brief the council.
